resources.string: Monitoring wheel connections to follow-connect automatically
This notification is safe to hide. Long tap for options
The location permission is required by the system to find wheels via Bluetooth. \n\nHowever no location data (like GPS) is used or collected.
The Nearby Devices permission is required by the system to find wheels via Bluetooth.
The Bluetooth Connect permission is required to find already connected wheels or connect to your wheel.
The Bluetooth Advertise permission is required for the Wheel Proxy functionality.

Location permission was denied.

Unfortunately, the app is not able to find and connect to your wheel via Bluetooth. 

Please go to Settings and grant the Location permission manually."

Nearby Devices permission was denied.

Unfortunately, the app is not able to find and connect to your wheel via Bluetooth. 

Please go to Settings and grant the Nearby Devices permission manually."

Bluetooth Connect permission was denied.

Unfortunately, the app is not able to connect to your wheel via Bluetooth. 

Please go to Settings and grant the Bluetooth Connect permission manually."
